H0.text: What is the name of the German anti-Islamisation group that organised a march in Newcastle last month (March 2015). PEGIDA

H1.text: What is the name of the German anti-Islamisation group that organised a march in Newcastle last month (March 2015). Pro Deutschland

H2.text: What is the name of the German anti-Islamisation group that organised a march in Newcastle last month (March 2015). Die Freiheit

H3.text: What is the name of the German anti-Islamisation group that organised a march in Newcastle last month (March 2015). LEGIDA

A4.text: On 28 February 2015, Pegida UK held its first protest in Newcastle upon Tyne, with around 400 attending.
